meaningMnemonic: The <radical>melon</radical> radical and the <kanji>melon</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Wahoo!
readingMnemonic: What's the best use for a <kanji>melon</kanji>? Not eating it, but running over it in your <reading>ca</reading>r (か)! Melons make a nice big splat sound when you drive over them, and that's what you plan to do to every melon you see.
